description: This command allows to update an invoice.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: If set to 1, then all data, related to the affected invoice (which were provided previously through the DATA[0..N] arguments of the commands CreateInvoice and UpdateInvoice), will be deleted before the update
Invoice data in the format key:value
If set to 1, removes the PDF version of the invoice, if existing
Resets the recipient information stored with the invoice (using the user data of the recipient)
Resets the sender information stored with the invoice (using the user data of the invoicing party)
Resets the template information stored with the invoice (using the template data of the invoicing party)
If given, updates the TAX rate of all accounting items that are assigned to the respective invoice
